title: Baby Carrier
description: two geometric embroidered panels in upper corners in shades of pink and grey; two elaborate floral embroidered designs in lower corners in pink and shades of tan on black; long center panel with embroidered geometric design in tan, pink and grey on black, surrounded by machine appliqued triangles in red and blue; blue lining
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
